welsh.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to not do something you have promised to do, such as paying someone money that you owe
welsh.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I never welch on my bets.
welsh.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: relating to Wales, its people, or its original language
welsh.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: the original language used in Wales
